docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v1 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: List all audits for a given host.

examples:
GET /api/audits
200
[
  {
    "audit": {
      "id": 980190962,
      "auditable_id": 980190962,
      "auditable_type": "Host",
      "user_id": null,
      "user_type": null,
      "action": "update",
      "audited_changes": {
        "architecture_id": [
          10463,
          10466
        ]
      },
      "version": 1,
      "comment": null,
      "associated_id": 272,
      "associated_type": "Host",
      "created_at": "2009-12-14T08:01:17Z",
      "remote_address": null,
      "auditable_name": null,
      "associated_name": null
    }
  }
]
